title: Can AP Bruiser get one item with 20% CDR?
body:
AD Bruisers can pick from the following. 

{{item:3078}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3161}} {{item:3071}}. 

It's much easier for AD champs to access 40% CDR with 2 items than it is for AP Bruisers. {{item:3115}} has no health or defense starts and a lot of AP bruiser can't go with {{item:3003}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3030}}.

Honestly, AD bruiser have much better items to choose from.

replies.body: Really wish theyd put cata back on glp....
{{item:3001}}  + {{item:3102}}  anyone? I know they have no hp but it's something. I think maybe something like {{item:3025}}  should have an AP scaling on the proc and be made melee only.
Ap bruisers don't buy Luden's or GLP? Why not?

No health, thats why.
Also, some AP bruisers dont use mana, so that ends up being a wasted stat.
